item.title: Contributing
item.description: PlayByPost-DnD uses GitHub to manage reviews of pull requests: If you have a trivial fix or improvement, go ahead and create a pull request. If you plan to do something more involved, discuss your ideas on the relevant GitHub issue. Steps to contribute For now, you need to add your fork as a remote on the original $GOPATH/src/github.com/betorvs/playbypost-dnd clone, so: $ go get github.com/betorvs/playbypost-dnd $ cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/betorvs/playbypost-dnd # GOPATH is $HOME/go by default.

item.title: Design
item.description: It was created using golangspell command. cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/betorvs/ mkdir playbypost-dnd cd playbypost-dnd golangspell init github.com/betorvs/playbypost-dnd playbypost-dnd Dependency Management The project is using Go Modules for dependency management Module: github.com/betorvs/playbypost-dnd Golang Spell The project was initialized using Golang Spell. A good post about it can be found here.. Architectural Model The Architectural Model adopted to structure the application is based on The Clean Architecture. Further details can be found here: The Clean Architecture and in the Clean Architecture Book.

item.title: Local Environment
item.description: Environment variables export PORT=8080 export APP_NAME=playbypost-dnd export LOG_LEVEL=INFO Local Run go build ./playbypost-dnd Test and coverage and lint Run the tests and coverage TESTRUN=true go test ./... -coverprofile=coverage.out go tool cover -html=coverage.out Install golangci-lint and run lint: golangci-lint run MongoDB Local docker run -d -p 27017:27017 mongo and export DB_CONNECTION_STRING export DB_CONNECTION_STRING="mongodb://localhost:27017/playbypost" Docker Build docker build .

item.title: Update Documentation
item.description: Setup Hugo Install hugo and execute the following commands cd documentation/pages hugo new site playbypost-dnd-documentation cd themes git clone https://github.com/thingsym/hugo-theme-techdoc.git Execute it local hugo server -D Create new pages hugo new development/local-environment.md Add weight: X and change draft to false.
